name: Example of Allure Behave
fullName: Welcome to Allure Behave!: Example of Allure Behave
description:
Welcome to Allure Behave!
This is a made-up scenario to demonstrate how a project with Behave and
Allure might be set up.
The steps are defined in `./test/steps/welcome_steps.py`.
The tested code is contained in `./src/examples_allure_behave/__init__.py`.

Allure might be set up.
The steps are defined in ./test/steps/welcome_steps.py.
The tested code is contained in ./src/examples_allure_behave/__init__.py.
